text: This is the discography for West Coast hip hop group, Compton's Most Wanted. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable" !align="left|Album Information |- |align="left"|It's a Compton Thang *Released: June 19, 1990 *Chart Positions: #133 US, #32 Top Hip Hop/R&B; *RIAA certification: None *Singles: "It's A Compton Thang", "I'm Wit Dat", "One Time Gaffled 'Em Up", "This Is Compton" |- |align="left"|Straight Checkn 'Em *Released: July 16, 1991 *Chart Positions: #92 US, #23 R&B;/Hip-Hop *RIAA certification: None *Singles: "Straight Checkn 'Em", "Growin' Up in the Hood", "Def Wish" |- |align="left"|Music to Driveby *Released: September 29, 1992 *Chart Positions: #66 US, #20 Top Hip Hop/R&B; *RIAA certification: None *Singles: "Hood Took Me Under", "N 2 Deep", "Def Wish II" |- |align="left"|Represent *Released: October 24, 2000 *Chart Positions: N/A *Last RIAA certification: None *Singles: "This is Compton 2000", "Then U Down" |- |align="left"|Music to Gang Bang *Released: June 13, 2006 *Chart Positions: N/A *Last RIAA certification: None *Singles: "Music to Gang Bang", "Still A Menace", "Come Ride With Me", "We Get Down Like That" |- |align="left"|Compton's O.G. *Released: October 10, 2006 *Chart Positions: N/A *Last RIAA certification: N/A *Singles: "Music 2 Gangbang" |- |align="left"|Gangsta Bizzness *Released: October 4, 2019 |} * Singles: Raw ===Compilation albums=== {| class="wikitable" !align="left|Album Information |- |align="left"|When We Wuz Bangin' 1989-1999: The Hitz *Released: January 23, 2001 *Chart Positions: *Last RIAA certification: None *Singles: "One Time Gaffled 'Em Up", Growin' Up in the Hood" "Late Night Hype" |} ==Singles== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of singles, with selected chart positions, showing year released and album name !
